channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole, 23rd May
item.description:
There are two large potholes on the road outside number 27 Willersey Road (Nettleton Road junction end) Benhall, Cheltenham. Very dangerous for cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 25 Willersey Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown grassed areas, 23rd May
item.description:
The estate owner should cut the grass regularly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Tobyfield Close, Bishops Cleeve

item.title: Broken glass in park, 23rd May
item.description:
There is a lot of broken glass around the basketball hoop in Tudor Park. The glass is on the concrete pad and in the grass around the seating area. The area is currently not usable due the danger of injury to both animals and children.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 29 Brandon Close, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road collapse on fruit farm side, 20th May
item.description:
